translated: “The One with Golden Skin, the Awakened One,

analyzed: gacchantam antarāpaṇe  vipassim satthavāhagga  nara varam vināyaka
translated: was walking along in the middle of the road.🔽Vipassī, the best of caravan leaders,🔽the best of men, the guide,
the one who tames the untamed, the one like this,
the great speaker, the one with great wisdom;
seeing him, I was pleased and happy,🔽and I raised one hand in respectful salutation.
I made that respectful salutation then;
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of the respectful salutation.
and the eight liberations as well,
the six supernormal knowledges have been realized,
the Buddha’s instruction has been done.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā ekañjaliko thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai ekañjalikaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus the elder Ekañjalika recited these verses.
